meanings.definition: Very large in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was superlarge compared to the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The superlarge cake was enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent3: The superlarge teddy bear looked comically big in the tiny chair.
meanings.sent4: Her superlarge smile lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The superlarge mountain loomed in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.

meanings.definition: Exceeding the usual size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The superlarge pumpkin won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The superlarge wave crashed against the shore with tremendous force.
meanings.sent3: The superlarge ice cream cone toppled over, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: His superlarge appetite surprised everyone at the table.
meanings.sent5: The superlarge umbrella shielded them from the pouring rain.
